review: had Netflix,hated it!paid them for over a year,should of just drove down the street and threw that money out of the window!fire stick is really cool!easy to set up,remote works great!it would take a lifetime to watch all the programming on this little box!thanks jeff this is great!oh yeah,get prime with it,you get a lot of added features!thanks again jeff!
author: ronald phillips

review: Have 4 Roku units in my house, but as a Prime member had to give the Fire TV stick a try.  Not terribly impressed.  Seems like every "app" needs to be paid for.  Plex, for example, costs $4.  I have a Plex lifetime subscription and simply install the app on my Roku and log in.  Maybe there is some promise for this if they get some of the app availability/pricing stuff worked out.
author: JB14

review: Amazing product I just wish I could turn it off when I'm done useing it
author: Edwin

review: Opens up a whole new world of video options and was very easy to install.  I have had some trouble finding the movies I want.  There does not seem to be a search feature so I can look for a title.
author: John Lloyd

review: Terrific little product. Streaming Amazon tv shows is instantaneous; on my Smart TV the buffering takes a long time - not so with the Fire TV Stick. Haven't tried it with movies from Amazon Prime yet, but so far I am very impressed.

review: Easy to install amd easy to use. I've used it every day since I got it.

review: I really like it but I am wondering if new movies and shows will be added as they become available. I am wondering if I should cancel my netflix since I have this.
